issue.title: [C++] Add basic continuation support to futures
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10182](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10182). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add support for Then, WhenAny, and WhenAll.  This will allow for expressing dependencies between tasks and eliminates threads in the thread pool that are simply waiting for other tasks to complete.
